definition: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: The edible-nest swiftlet has its home on a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 食用燕窩燕窩懸崖上有它的家。

sentences.english: The edible-nest swiftlet has its home on a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 食用燕窩燕窩懸崖上有它的家。

sentences.english: The front features the National Stadium, or Bird's Nest, on the middle-right.
sentences.chinese: 前線的特點，國家體育場，或燕窩，對中層的權利。

sentences.english: Edible bird's nest is the nest made purely of swiftlet's saliva secretion.
sentences.chinese: 食用燕窩是金絲燕的巢純粹的唾液分泌。

sentences.english: Babies that are 6 month old can be fed with rice porridge or congee containing bird's nest.
sentences.chinese: 六個月大的嬰孩能用含燕窩的米粥或粥。

sentences.english: It direct-import shark fin, bird's nest and fish maw from all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 建昌隆亦從世界各地直接入口魚翅，燕窩及花膠。

sentences.english: However, edible bird's nest is different from most of the TCMs.
sentences.chinese: 然而，食用燕窩不同於大多數中藥。

sentences.english: China's birds' nest soup is described as a dish with a "snot-like mouthfeel".
sentences.chinese: 文章稱，中國的燕窩有着猶如“鼻涕一樣的口感”。

definition: to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
